comments:
Description:
Set -ea as ReportRunner's arguments will cause AssertionError when generate 
pdf/fo.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Using ReportRunner to run a report file
2. Add -ea in VM arguments
3. Generate fo or pdf file

Result:
java.lang.AssertionError
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.emitter.fo.FOReportEmitter.endRow
(FOReportEmitter.java:668)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.WrappedEmitter.endRow
(WrappedEmitter.java:119)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.WrappedEmitter.endRow
(WrappedEmitter.java:119)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.presentation.HtmlPaginateEmitter.endRow
(HtmlPaginateEmitter.java:179)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.TableItemExecutor.accessRow
(TableItemExecutor.java:542)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.TableItemExecutor.accessTableBand
(TableItemExecutor.java:448)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.TableItemExecutor.accessHeader
(TableItemExecutor.java:332)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ListingElementExecutor.accessQuery
(ListingElementExecutor.java:75)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.TableItemExecutor.execute
(TableItemExecutor.java:133)
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutorVisitor.visitTableItem
(ReportExecutorVisitor.java:181)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.ir.TableItemDesign.accept
(TableItemDesign.java:69)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.executor.ReportExecutor.execute
(ReportExecutor.java:158)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run
(RunAndRenderTask.java:151)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.executeReport
(ReportRunner.java:178)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.execute
(ReportRunner.java:115)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.main
(ReportRunner.java:86)
